FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 13-08-2024 12:36:43   (GMT +5:30)
REFERÎ•NCE NO: 17685576 


ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL

MV  AVIGATOR  OPEN GRESIK, INDONESIA O/A 22TH AUG
- BOD ABT 700-800MTS LSFO AND ABT 70-75MTS LSMGO

MV AVIGATOR

DOUBLE SKIN BULK CARRIER, FLAG PANAMA, BUILT 2002

DWT: 53806 MTS ON 12.49 M SSW

5HO/HA, LOA: 189.99 M, BEAM: 32.26 M, DEPTH 17.20 M

GT/NT 31167 / 18384

GR/BL 2321876/2247031 CBF, ALL AFT/STEEL FLOORED

HATCH SIZES: NO1 18.86X18.26, NO2-5 21.32X18.26 M

MCGREGOR HCOVERS, CLASS NK, PANDI SKULD, CO2 FITTED

GEAR: 4 X 40 TNS (HOOK LOAD) CRANES, MAX OUTREACH 11.8 M

GRABS: MECHANICAL GRABS WITH REMOTE CONTROL 4X12 CBM

TANK TOP STRENGTH UNIFORM 25 T/M2.

SPEED/CONSUMPTION

LADEN ABT 12 KN / BALLAST ABT 12.5 KN ON ABT 26 MT LSFO PLUS ABT 0.2 MTS LS MGO PER 24 HRS 

VSL IDLE ABT 3.0 MTS LSFO PLUS ABT 0.2 MTS LS MGO, WORKING ABT 5.0 MTS LSFO PLUS ABT 0.2 MTS LS MGO

VSL CONSUMES LS MGO FOR GENERATORS AND MAIN ENGINE IN CONFINED/NARROW

WATERS-CHANNELS, CANALS, RIVERS, WHEN SAILING IN BAD WEATHER/ROUGH SEA

OR BELOW 10 KNOTS, ENTERING LEAVING PORTS AND IN GENERAL RESTRICTED TO

NAVIGATION/MANEUVERING AREA WITH OR WITHOUT PILOTS, TO MASTER'S

DISCRETION, AS WELL AS, FOR STARTING AND STOPPING GENERATORS AND BOILER.

THE SPEED OF THIS VESSEL IS ALWAYS TO BE CONSIDERED AS AVERAGE SPEED IN

FULLY LADEN CONDITION AND GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS WHICH ARE DEFINED AS

CONTINUOUS PERIODS OF 24 HRS WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT, NO NEGATIVE

INFLUENCE OF SWELL, MODERATE SEA, WIND NOT EXCEEDING BF 4 A/O DOUGLAS

SEA STATE 3 (WITH SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT UP TO 1.25  MTRS).BUNKER SPECS

ISO 8217 2010 STANDARDS I.E. RMG 380 FOR IFO AND DMB FOR MDO OR DMA FOR

MGO. AS FROM 01.01.20 VESSEL WILL BURN VLSFO MAX SULPHUR CONTENT 0.5 PCT

ISO/PAS 23263:2019      

(ALL FIGURES ABOUT)


PLSD TO HEAR.
 
BEST REGARDS,

Tonnage Desk:
PG-WCI-Rsea-Safr: Nitin Sharma | Mob: +91 9311255654  | Skype: mailto:acpl.nithin@outlook.com
